Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1969...
Injured on 7/5/1969 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 8/4/1970 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/21/1974...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1975, going 4-0, 1.42...
Injured on 4/20/1979 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Wisconsin on 2/7/1980 to a 3-year deal worth $7,500,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/10/1980, off Scott Wiltshire (NE)...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 5/5/1983 to a 1-year deal worth $1,236,000 per year...
Traded from New Jersey to Boston (UBA) on 5/12/1983 (Going to PIL: P H. Miller. Going to NJ: P C. Stelly)...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/3/1984 to a 4-year deal worth $4,111,444 per year...
Injured on 4/17/1984 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
